struct s_ITEM_POWER
{
/* 00 */ char name[18];
/* 12 */ int16_t item_types;  // bitfield; bit position ~== item type;  enum I_TypeBits
/* 14 */ int16_t cost;
/* 16 */ int8_t type;
/* 17 */ int8_t Realm;
/* 18 */ int16_t Books_or_Bonus;
/* 1A */ uint32_t powers;  // ; enum IPOW_LO ; enum IPOW_HI
/* 1E */
};
